sections.title: Eidolon Base Statistics and Progression
sections.description: Core eidolon statistics table showing progression by summoner level, plus explanations of each column including class level, HD, BAB, saves, skills, feats, armor bonus, ability bonuses, evolution pool, and max attacks

sections.title: Eidolon Special Abilities
sections.description: All special abilities gained by eidolons as they level up, including darkvision, link, share spells, evasion, ability score increases, devotion, multiattack, and improved evasion

sections.title: Eidolon Base Forms
sections.description: Overview of eidolon base forms and how they determine starting size, speed, AC, attacks, and ability scores, including rules for Small eidolons

sections.title: Aquatic Base Form
sections.description: Statistics and free evolutions for the aquatic base form eidolon

sections.title: Avian Base Form
sections.description: Statistics and free evolutions for the avian base form eidolon

sections.title: Biped Base Form
sections.description: Statistics and free evolutions for the biped base form eidolon

sections.title: Quadruped Base Form
sections.description: Statistics and free evolutions for the quadruped base form eidolon

sections.title: Serpentine Base Form
sections.description: Statistics and free evolutions for the serpentine base form eidolon

sections.title: Tauric Base Form
sections.description: Statistics and free evolutions for the tauric base form eidolon

sections.title: Evolutions System Overview
sections.description: How evolutions work, including evolution points, natural attacks, primary vs secondary attacks, and how evolutions are organized by point cost

sections.title: 1-Point Evolutions
sections.description: All evolutions that cost 1 evolution point, including basic magic, bite, claws, climb, improved natural armor, resistance, scent, and many others

sections.title: 2-Point Evolutions
sections.description: All evolutions that cost 2 evolution points, including ability increase, energy attacks, flight, grab, immunity, limbs, and others

sections.title: 3-Point Evolutions
sections.description: All evolutions that cost 3 evolution points, including blindsense, burrow, damage reduction, frightful presence, and swallow whole

sections.title: 4-Point Evolutions
sections.description: All evolutions that cost 4 evolution points, including blindsight, breath weapon, fast healing, large size, and spell resistance

sections.title: Eidolon Models Overview
sections.description: Introduction to pre-built eidolon models that provide shortcuts for creating eidolons with specific themes and appearances

sections.title: Aboleth Eidolon Model
sections.description: Pre-built eidolon model for creating an aboleth-like aquatic aberrant creature

sections.title: Angel Eidolon Model
sections.description: Pre-built eidolon model for creating a celestial being like an angel or archon
